resource.name: Sample first midterm
resource.intro: This is fairly representative of what your first midterm might be like except that it does not contain any 2D kinematics and contains Unit #4 material.  You can find 2D kinematics questions on the sample final.  Also, this midterm was designed for a 90 minute evening session.  Your exam will be written in 60 minutes (plus breakout) so it will have to be shorter than this.
